pages.text: You can often find it in the Molten Hills biome. By destroying its ore, you will get Raw Dalite, which must be smelted into a Dalite Nugget for further work. Using 5 Dalite Nuggets, you will be able to craft some Dalite Crystals. Pure Dalite is quite fragile, but has the ability to store, concentrate and transmit a special kind of energy.
